PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DistributionFlowElementCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Common properties of all occurrences of IfcDistributionFlowElement and their subtypes.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specific instance (e.g. 'WWS/VS1/400/001', which indicates the occurrence belongs to system WWS, subsystems VSI/400, and has the component number 001)
